author: lathomas
body:
This PR adds three new histograms to L1PrefiringMaps.root, corresponding respectively to the L1 prefiring maps for photons, jets (parametrized vs pt and eta), and jets (parametrized vs EMpt and eta) in UL17. They are labelled by the suffix "_UL2017BtoF". 

The file is an input to the prefiring weight producer and is related to this PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32542

The maps (and the file) was tested and validated. See this talk:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/985369/#3-ul2017-prefiring-maps-tbc

Thanks, 
Laurent
title: Adding UL17 prefiring maps for photons and jet
